document.discussion_title: Islanders on the precipice of washing away 23 years of ugly
document.topic_text: Eventually , the Islanders are going to find their Rob Carpenter , their Bob Nevin , their Bobby Thomson . Sooner or later, there will be deliverance, and the drought will be over and done with, the millstone around the franchise’s neck will be
document.post: Eventually , the Islanders are going to find their Rob Carpenter , their Bob Nevin , their Bobby Thomson . Sooner or later, there will be deliverance, and the drought will be over and done with, the millstone around the franchise’s neck will be
